Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 26-33 While electron - withdrawing TPD possesses a relatively simple , symmetric , and planar structure suitable for D-A copolymers in PSCs , DPP exhibits very strong electron - withdrawing effect due to the presence of electrondeficient lactam rings and strong π-π interactions.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| electron-withdrawing TPD |
| D-A copolymers in PSCs |
| DPP |
| electron-deficient lactam rings |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| electron-withdrawing TPD |
| DPP |
| D-A copolymers in PSCs (Device structure, not a material) |
| electron-deficient lactam rings (Chemical structure of DPP) |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 26-33 While electron - withdrawing TPD possesses a relatively simple , symmetric , and planar structure suitable for D-A copolymers in PSCs , DPP exhibits very strong electron - withdrawing effect due to the presence of electrondeficient lactam rings and strong π-π interactions.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| ------------- |
| relatively simple |
| symmetric |
| planar structure |
| suitable for D-A copolymers in PSCs |
| relatively large electron-withdrawing effect |
| presence of electron-deficient lactam rings |
| strong π-π interactions |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------- |
| relatively simple structure |
| symmetric structure |
| planar structure |
| suitable for D-A copolymers in PSCs |
| strong electron-withdrawing effect |
| presence of electron-deficient lactam rings |
| strong π-π interactions |

Note: "relatively" and "suitable for" are not material properties and have been removed.

Paragraph: 26-33 While electron - withdrawing TPD possesses a relatively simple , symmetric , and planar structure suitable for D-A copolymers in PSCs , DPP exhibits very strong electron - withdrawing effect due to the presence of electrondeficient lactam rings and strong π-π interactions.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| electron-withdrawing TPD has a relatively simple, symmetric, and planar structure |
| D-A copolymers in PSCs have electron-withdrawing TPD |
| DPP exhibits very strong electron-withdrawing effect |
| DPP has electron-deficient lactam rings |
| DPP experiences strong π-π interactions. |

|-----------------------------|
| electron-withdrawing effect of DPP is very strong |
| structure of electron-withdrawing TPD is relatively simple, symmetric, and planar |
| DPP contains electron-deficient lactam rings |
| DPP experiences strong π-π interactions. |
